doc:
Alie Ward https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alie_Ward 0 Alison Ann Ward is an American writer, painter, actress, and television and podcast host. She is currently a correspondent for the CBS series Innovation Nation. Ward has written for L.A. Weekly and the Los Angeles Times. She has appeared in a handful of TV shows, including Nash Bridges. She achieved notoriety while collaborating with Georgia Hardstark on Cooking Channel programs Tripping Out with Alie Georgia, Unique Sweets, and Classy Ladies, as well as the Feral Audio podcast Slumber Party with Alie Georgia. In September 2017, Alie launched the science/comedy podcast, Ologies, in which she interviews a different expert, or "ologist," every episode. Alison_Ann_Ward is an_American_writer , painter , actress , and television_and_podcast_host . She is currently a_correspondent for the_CBS_series_Innovation_Nation . Ward has_written for L.A._Weekly and the_Los_Angeles_Times . She has_appeared in a_handful of TV_shows , including Nash_Bridges . She achieved notoriety while collaborating with Georgia_Hardstark on Cooking_Channel_programs Tripping Out with Alie_ , Unique_Sweets , and Classy_Ladies , as_well_as the_Feral_Audio_podcast_Slumber_Party with Alie_ . In September_2017 , Alie launched the_science/comedy_podcast , Ologies , in which she interviews a_different_expert , or " ologist , " every_episode .
